home: In all of these projects, all assets, programming, and music were created by me unless strictly stated otherwise.
p1: Project A.R.M.O.R. was created as a final project from the class “Core Principles: Game Art” at SCAD. This was my first class where I learned Maya and Unreal Engine. This project was made entirely using Unreal Engine 5, Maya 2022, and Photoshop. This project uses the default sky in UE5.
p2: 'Homesick' was my final project for Applied Principles: Game Art at SCAD. This environment was made entirely using Unreal Engine 5, Maya 2024, and Photoshop. It depicts the living area of a scientist in space waiting to go home.
p3: Rythym City is a 2D platformer game created entirely using Procreate and Processing 4.0 (And Garageband for music). This game was created as a final project for Core Principles: Programming at SCAD. All code, music, and assets except for the character sprite were created by me.
